1A.title: 1.A. Successful setup
1A.precursor_group: Precursor: Kid has had no interaction with StoryCall.

steps.speaker: kid
steps.text: storycall

steps.speaker: storycall
steps.text:
Welcome to StoryCall, where we deliver your voice recordings as phone calls. Text STOP or HELP at any time.

To begin, tell us the phone number we should call with your messages.

Tap the attachment button in the bottom left corner of your text app. Make a new voice recording of that phone number and send it to us.

steps.speaker: kid
steps.text: Call four one five, five five five, one two three four.

steps.speaker: storycall
steps.text:
Great — we’ll call 415-555-1234 with your future messages. If that’s not correct, send another audio message with the
right number.

From now on, whenever Kid sends an audio message to StoryCall, we’ll call 415-555-1234 and play Kid’s recording.
We’ll send you any reply as a text in this same thread.

Kid can text HELP or STOP anytime. Kid can also text the StoryCall Admin directly here (plain text).

3B.title: 3.B. HELP: how to attach a voice recording

steps.speaker: kid
steps.text: HELP I can’t figure out the audio thing

steps.speaker: storycall
steps.text:
No problem. In your texting app:
- Tap the + or attachment button near the message box.
- Choose Audio / Voice / Record.
- Record your message (or the phone number), then tap Send.
Tip: avoid speech-to-text dictation — we need an actual audio recording.

steps.speaker: kid
steps.text: HELP I need to change who you call

steps.speaker: storycall
steps.text:
To change the call-to number, send the new phone number as an audio recording.
After I confirm it, I’ll use that new number for your future messages.
